#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long 
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define MAX 405
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;

int main ()
{
	int t,n,m,x;
	sc(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		sc(n);
		m=-1;
		while(n--)
		{
			sc(x);
			m=max(m,x);
		}
		pf(m);
	}
	return 0 ;
}
